description:
Microsoft Excel 2016 for Windows is a very useful and powerful business software tool - it can be challenging if you have never used Excel before. In this course we introduce and cover the following topics

  1. Step-by-step how to create a workbook
  2. Creating new worksheets
  3. How to, enter data
  4. Format cells basic formulas and functions
  5. Set types of cell referencing
  6. Simple charting
  7. Creating headers and footers
  8. Printing and exporting files

This course will prepares your and gets you familiar familiar with all of the basic tools and develops your skills for setting up basic spreadsheets in Excel and started quickly in developing your own spreadsheets or using some of the predeveloped templates that are already available through Office 2016.
title: Starting Out with Excel 2016
